title: T3 PSA Set -- 20 To Go -- Can anyone help?
author: becollie

posts.post_title: T3 PSA Set -- 20 To Go -- Can anyone help?
posts.post_content:

49    Close Play At Second
79    George Bell

Let me know what you have and asking price.  I am at [url]collie.brian@bcg.com[/url]

Thanks!

Brian
